body_html:
@liyzjj I've also tried this on python 3.5 but got the same error.
@skye I disabled gpu by setting the variable to -1
os.environ["CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES"]='-1'

Alternatively, I also tried setting tf device to '/cpu:0'
I still get the error as
InvalidArgumentError: No OpKernel was registered to support Op 'Resampler' with these attrs. Registered devices: [CPU], Registered kernels:
<no registered kernels>

 [[Node: resampler/Resampler = Resampler[T=DT_FLOAT](ones, zeros)]]
body_text:
@liyzjj I've also tried this on python 3.5 but got the same error.
@skye  I disabled gpu by setting the variable to -1
os.environ["CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES"]='-1'
Alternatively, I also tried setting tf device to '/cpu:0'
I still get the error as
InvalidArgumentError: No OpKernel was registered to support Op 'Resampler' with these attrs.  Registered devices: [CPU], Registered kernels:
<no registered kernels>
 [[Node: resampler/Resampler = Resampler[T=DT_FLOAT](ones, zeros)]]
